explains: v. 使……着迷（captivate 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: For him, the netsuke, so small and captivating, were not enough as a mere signpost to family history.
sentences.cn: 对他而言，这小巧迷人的吊坠并不能够作为仅仅是家族史的路标来看待。

sentences.en: One of the most captivating natural events of the year in many areas throughout North America is the turning of the leaves in the fall.
sentences.cn: 北美许多地区一年中最迷人的自然现象之一是秋天树叶的变色。
